title: Interpretation of forgiveness in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream, one of the most beautiful things that Muslims follow in Islam is asking for forgiveness, as it is a way to get closer to God Almighty and erase the sins that one may commit in his life. The meaning and interpretation of those dreams that a person sees, and seeing such dreams is good for the fortuneteller, so today in this article we will learn about the interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream. Interpretation of seeing forgiveness in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Our respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing forgiveness in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates Good news to its owner. Regarding the verse of Surat Nuh, I said: Ask forgiveness from your Lord, for He was Forgiving, and He sent you abundant Paradise, and He will reward you with wealth and children, and He will make you gardens and make you rivers. Well, asking for forgiveness in a dream is an abundant sign of earning a living that he will get his dream, either with money or with children. The virtue of seeing forgiveness in a dream is not limited to this world only, but rather it is a sign of the high position that the dreamer will attain in God Almighty, because it A sign of contentment. As for seeking forgiveness without praying in a dream, it is a sign that God Almighty will prolong the life of the dreamer. Asking for forgiveness in a dream could be a sign of the victory that God will achieve. If a woman finds in her dream that someone is telling her about the need to ask for forgiveness in the dream, then her vision portends to her the need to stop the sins that she is committing in reality and repent to God Almighty. Asking forgiveness after praying in a dream is good news that the prayer will be answered, God willing, in the near future. Interpretation of seeing forgiveness in a dream for a single woman: If you see a girl asking for forgiveness in a dream, this is good for what she will get in the near future. This dream is a sign that she will enjoy an excellent position and all her wishes in her life will come true. It is also a sign of his closeness to God Almighty and his distance from sins and disobedience. In some cases, such a dream is a sign that he will face many difficulties, but thanks to God, he will be able to overcome them quickly. Interpretation of seeing forgiveness in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman finds herself asking for forgiveness in a dream, then her dream is a sign of great and good happiness that she will receive. On it soon. In any case, it is one of the good things that you will achieve in life, whether it is in good offspring or abundant money. Interpretation of seeing forgiveness in a dream for a pregnant woman. The dream of asking forgiveness in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of happiness to see her child soon and this dream also shows the end of the pain and problems that I felt it during pregnancy. Perhaps it is a sign that the desires that I have long desired will come true. Interpretation of seeing forgiveness in a dream for a man: Whoever sees in his dream that he is asking for forgiveness, then his vision is a sign of faith in God, piety, and piety that fills his heart. Asking forgiveness in a dream is a sign of removing worries and problems that hinder life And the arrival of relief and goodness from God Almighty. Asking forgiveness in general is a sign of a blessing in the dreamer’s life, whether for livelihood, work, or anything else. In conclusion, it is mentioned that all the interpretations that we have seen in this article talk about

title: Interpretation of gorilla in a dream

preview.html: Gorillas are animals that cause fear to some extent when they are seen, and in the interpretation of a gorilla in a dream, there are many interpretations and many connotations. They were psychological, social, and psychological, and in this article, through the encyclopedia, we will explain the different interpretations of seeing a gorilla in a dream. Interpretation of a gorilla in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a gorilla in a dream means that there is a treacherous person in the dreamer’s life and he must be careful. If one sees that he is fighting a gorilla and defeating him, this means that he will fall ill, but he will quickly recover from his illness. In the event of a fight with the gorilla, who wins in the end, this indicates To a serious illness and perhaps the dreamer’s death. Interpretation of a gorilla in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Sheikh Al-Nabulsi interprets seeing a gorilla in a dream and says that when you see yourself buying a gorilla in a dream or taking it from a dear person, this means fraud and deception to which the dreamer will be exposed. If you see yourself eating gorilla meat in a dream If an unmarried girl sees a gorilla in her dream, this means that she knows a deceitful young man who wants Deceive her and she must be careful. Also, seeing a gorilla in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of an evil man in that girl’s life. Seeing a gorilla in an unmarried girl’s dream may mean that she will marry a man who will cause her many worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing a gorilla in a dream For a single woman: For a married woman, if she sees a gorilla in a dream, this means that there is a man in her life who is very cunning and deceitful. Seeing a gorilla in a married woman’s dream also indicates poverty, loss of money, and loss of blessings. It also indicates that the woman will face many problems. Interpretation of a gorilla in a dream for a pregnant woman: If you dream of a pregnant woman with a gorilla, this means that she will give birth to a male child. Seeing a gorilla in a pregnant woman’s dream also indicates that she will receive good news, as well as that her birth will be Easy. Interpretation of a dream about a gorilla in a dream about a man. A man seeing a gorilla in a dream indicates that there is an evil person in his life who is trying to undermine the dreamer and also indicates many problems that the dreamer faces. A man seeing a gorilla indicates the presence of an unjust and unjust person who eats forbidden money. When he sees If a man dreams that he is very afraid of gorillas, this indicates the comfort and security that the dreamer experiences. For more interpretation of dreams, visit the Direct Dreams application.

title: Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream is different

preview.html: Many people want to interpret seeing the Messenger in a dream differently, as it conveys a lot of good news and good news to the forerunner, and according to the events of the vision, its results come. In addition to taking into account the situation in which the dreamer was in his dream, there are basic evidence for interpreting seeing the Messenger in a dream in addition to its actual form. As for the general content of the prophetic vision, it is therefore good. News for the fortune teller, but if it is other than that. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream differently. Through the website Various, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream differently as follows: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream differently. If the dreamer is sick, then seeing him indicates that his condition will get worse and worsen a lot, and if He did not suspect the disease. This symbolizes that he will contract the disease in the near future as a small cable and then it will heal, God willing. If the dreamer works in a job that enjoys great financial and professional stability, then this vision is an indication that this situation will change for the worse than he expected. One of the worst interpretations of what the commentators see However, if a person sees the Prophet in a dream, it means the destruction of his family and social relationships, as many hostilities may break out between him and those around him, leading to their corruption. The dream of the Prophet also indicates otherwise that he is often preoccupied with worldly matters that may distract him from the afterlife, so he is in Its content is a strong warning that he should not ignore so that he can reform himself and work in the afterlife. Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream without his image as a married woman When she interprets that she sees the Messenger in a dream in a different form in her dream, this indicates certain interpretations, including: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream other than his image for a woman A married woman indicates that she is a hypocrite who does not adhere to the teachings of her religion. If she sees the Prophet in a dream in a different way, then the dream means a deterioration in her emotional state and may lead to separation from her partner. But if she sees him speaking to her without hearing his voice, this indicates her need to perform some acts of worship and she must Trying to get closer to God in different ways in terms of her prayers, values ​​and morals. The interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream when he is not in his image is that he commands her to sin. The interpretation of the dream of the Messenger in the house of a woman who sits without seeing him but knows of his presence. This dream is real and indicates that she will enjoy a lot of goodness, prosperity and happiness in the future. All aspects of her life, whether emotional, practical or scientific. This dream can be interpreted as the return of an absent person who traveled for a long time and she could be a relative and could be her fiancé or her life partner. Some scholars may interpret this as a sign of disturbances and crises in her work that push her to She leaves her job, but after that she will get a better job opportunity in which she will excel more than before. If a married woman sees her husband with the image of the Messenger in her dream, this indicates the husband’s death soon and God Almighty will seal him and he will die as a witness. Seeing the Prophet in a dream other than the image of a pregnant woman is the interpretation of seeing the Messenger. In a dream in a different way for a pregnant woman, according to the opinion of many interpreters, it has different meanings as follows: Interpretations of the vision of jurisprudence indicate

title: Interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing a waterfall with water in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a waterfall with water in a dream according to the state and circumstances of the viewer, and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Today, through one of the Vision websites, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Sirin. Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream? Seeing a waterfall in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve his goals and desires in life. Seeing a waterfall in a dream also indicates that the dreamer is a good person with a kind heart, good morals, and a good reputation. Seeing a waterfall In a dream, it indicates the future life of the fortuneteller, which will be full of prosperity and goodness. Seeing a waterfall in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a great livelihood and a very good living in the coming period. Seeing a waterfall in a dream also indicates the great success that the god will achieve in his professional and social life. Vision Waterfalls in a dream indicates the ability of a visionary to plan his future and life well. See also: Interpretation of seeing a water pump in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream for a single woman? A single woman seeing a waterfall in a dream indicates that her life in the coming period will be full of stability and happiness. Seeing isolated people They jump from a waterfall while they are happy in a dream. It indicates that promising things will happen in the coming days. Seeing single women, a waterfall with salt water in a dream indicates that they will go through a difficult time and full of many problems. Seeing a single woman in a cold waterfall in a dream indicates the end of all Problems and problems in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone spraying me with water in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream for a married woman? A married woman seeing a waterfall in a dream announces her stable and happy married life. Seeing a married woman suffering from cataract problems in a dream shows that she will get rid of everything Problems in her life. Seeing a married woman who has not given birth in a dream of a waterfall, which indicates that God will carry her soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman dropping mud from a waterfall in a dream indicates that there are some problems between her and her husband. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bottle of water in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a waterfall? In a dream for a pregnant woman? A pregnant woman seeing a waterfall in a dream shows that she will have an easy and smooth pregnancy. Seeing a pregnant woman swimming in a waterfall in a dream says that she will go through a difficult and stressful period with many crises. Seeing a pregnant woman looking at a waterfall in a dream announces a lot of kindness and livelihood. Plenty for her and her child. See also: The interpretation of seeing water coming out of the ground in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream for a man? A man who sees a waterfall in a dream says that he is experiencing a period of prosperity and comfort financially and socially. A sick person seeing a waterfall in a dream indicates that he will soon recover from this disease and

title: Interpretation of seeing a naked man in a dream for an unmarried woman and different cases by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Through this encyclopedia article, you can see in detail the interpretation of seeing a naked man in a dream for a single woman. There are many disturbing visions that the dreamer sees in a dream, and he does not know the reason for their appearance in his dreams, and these visions indicate that something unpleasant will happen to the dreamer, dreams that send worries and fears and disturb them. Dreamers always believe that they are bad dreams and do not bode well, such as seeing others naked in a dream, which is a vision that differs in its positions between men and women, and despite this belief, dream interpretations are of great interest to many curiosities, as it prompts them to search the Internet for the meaning of the dream, so in the following lines you can find out what dream interpreters said about seeing a man naked in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a naked man in a dream for a single woman The dream interpreter, Ibn Sirin, explained that seeing the nakedness of an unmarried person in a dream has many different meanings, including that it expresses that she is going through changes in her life, especially on the emotional level. This vision reflects the dreamer's preoccupation with the topic of marriage in reality and her desire to marry the one she loves, and the extent of her lack of love and attention, and it also shows her anticipation of an important matter in reality. When an unmarried woman dreams of this vision and feels distressed and disturbed in the dream, this indicates her purity, chastity and good condition, and this vision also expresses the non-acceptance of the person who asks to marry her except on a professional level, the dream indicates her refusal to work in the job offered to her. In If a person sees a man naked by his relatives, this indicates her love for him in reality and her desire to marry him. From a religious point of view, this vision is a warning message to the dreamer to strive for self-discipline, adhere to obeying God, and avoid falling into forbidden things. Dream interpretation scholars mentioned that one of the praiseworthy symbols of this vision is that it indicates the achievement of what the dreamer wants in reality and also expresses the great status he enjoys in reality. This vision expresses the dreamer's ability to bear burdens and pressures and strive to achieve what she aims for. If the dreamer is engaged, this vision is in reality good news that her wedding date is approaching, and God knows best. As for the undesirable symbols of this vision, for the disobedient dreamer, it is a sign of her evil deeds and her distance from God. Interpretation of a man's aura in a dream by Ibn Sirin In general, seeing a man naked in a dream means that everyone will reveal the secrets that the dreamer hides and expose him to the scandal of those who hate him. If the dreamer occupies a prestigious position in reality, this vision symbolizes the loss of this position, and God knows best. However, if the person who feels that his private parts have been exposed Being ashamed to show his private parts in front of others indicates the suspicion and doubt that the dreamer is exposed to from some of those around him. As for the meaning of this vision in the market, it is an indication of the events that the dreamer tried to hide but others reveal. If the dreamer is naked and someone chases him, this indicates someone who deceives himself in his presentation and seeks to distort

title: What is the interpretation of shaking hands with the dead and kissing in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Shaking hands with the dead and kissing him in a dream. A person may die, but he remains connected to the living through dreams and visions, thus appearing to them as a partner in their joys and sorrows, sharing their fears and sending them messages through their dreams, because seeing the dead is real. Every person wants to know the interpretation of his dreams related to the dead, so what is the interpretation of shaking hands with the dead and kissing him, and is it a good vision or otherwise? Shaking hands with the dead and kissing him in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Shaking hands with the dead and kissing him in a dream Shaking hands with the dead in a dream is one of the good visions, as it is one of the signs of the deceased’s goodness and well-being. In conclusion, he enjoys a good position with God Almighty, so the dreamer’s heart is at peace with him. The deceased. Interpretation of the dream of shaking hands with the deceased and kissing is interpreted as good and sustenance that the dreamer will receive in the near future, wait for that. The dream of shaking hands with the deceased and kissing can also be interpreted as the love and friendship that existed between the deceased and the deceased, and the continuation of the relationship between them even after death, from Through continuous prayers for the deceased. He appears in a dream to express his thanks to the dreamer. If the dreamer shakes hands with the dead person and then walks with him to a place, this is a sign of the dreamer’s long life, and that he is following in the footsteps of the dead person, whether that is good or bad. Shaking hands with the dead person and kissing him in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted shaking hands with the dead person and kissing him In a dream, the dead person asks the dreamer for help by begging him or giving charity on his behalf until the reward reaches his grave, and he may have a debt that he is unable to pay. For life and needs to be paid by the dreamer on his behalf. If the dreamer shakes hands with the deceased and smiles, and the dreamer feels reassured, this is good news, because it symbolizes that he will receive a lot of money in the near future. However, if the dreamer felt fear and discomfort, then it was an unfavorable vision that predicted his imminent death, and God Almighty knows best. Kissing the dead in a dream is also considered a happy vision, as it promises the dreamer a lot of sustenance and goodness that will come his way. Egyptian website Akbar website. He specializes in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google and get the correct interpretations. Shaking hands with a dead person and kissing him in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried woman sees herself shaking hands with a dead person in a dream, this is evidence of her purity and good morals and that her behavior is good among people. That he will get married soon. As for kissing a dead girl in a dream, it is also one of the praiseworthy visions that foretells care and kindness, and is often a sign that she will marry soon. Shaking hands with a dead person and kissing him in a dream for a married woman. Shaking hands with a deceased person and kissing a married woman is a promising vision, as it symbolizes the love and friendship that binds the deceased. And to the dreamer, it also foretells her stability, which controls her married life, and an abundant livelihood that provides the family’s will. She will soon acquire it, which will put her in a state of prosperity and well-being. If the deceased is known in the dream, this is an indication of a benefit that she will bring to the deceased, whether it is an inheritance or a benefit from a relative of the deceased.

title: What does a mobile phone symbol mean in a dream and a conversation with someone?

preview.html: The symbol of a mobile phone in a dream. In fact, the mobile phone is a tool for communication and communication between a person and his friends, acquaintances, or loved ones of all kinds, and seeing it in a dream is evidence of the existence of interpretations about this connection and relationships between people. Here we present to you everything that was stated in the words of dream interpretation scholars about this vision, with varying details. The symbol of a mobile phone in a dream. Although the cell phone did not exist in the era of the great interpretation scholars, the interpretations came through their interpretation of various means of communication away from phones. It is said that seeing a person in a dream holding a mobile phone in his hand, and that he is about to bear a small child, then his wife will give birth to him if she is already pregnant, but if she is not pregnant then she is. News of her imminent pregnancy. Seeing it could be an indication that the dreamer is looking for a job opportunity abroad, trying to realize himself and improve his social level. It also indicates a lot of good news that will reach the viewer and it may be good news of the return of a close friend who has been absent for a long time. The visionary is a friendly person who loves others and does not hesitate to provide assistance to them if someone asks him for something. However, if his cell phone breaks in a dream, this is evidence of a defect in his family relationship, and this defect may lead to the severing of the relationship between him and one of his relatives, if there is a dispute between them. In fact, seeing the dreamer’s phone burning in his dream means that he is committing illegal acts, whether in the field of work or on a personal level, such as cheating on his wife if he is married or committing indecency if he is a single young man. Interpretation of seeing the mobile phone symbol in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin did not witness the era of mobile phones, but these interpretations are due to the symbols and methods of communication between people in his time. He said that whoever dreams that he receives some news on his mobile phone and is happy with it, then he is thinking a lot about something or He has a strong desire for a certain thing to happen and will receive a call informing him of its fulfillment. The desired goal and desire. He also said that seeing it in a person’s dream is evidence of a great difference in his circumstances. If the man is single, he will date a good and beautiful girl and soon officially marry her. If the dreamer is married, he will have a beautiful child, and if he has children, he may have a good job opportunity that will change his life. I also mentioned that this vision for a single woman is evidence of her emotional attachment to someone What, but the only drawback that her family faces in that person is that he is a stranger in her town, and if she seems happy while receiving the call, she will be able to convince the family of this suitor. But if the dreamer is unable to receive calls on his phone in the dream and is worried about it. The vision is an indication of the many differences that arise between oneself and his partner, whether the wife or the partner. If the mobile phone breaks in the dreamer’s dream, he suffers from severe pain, which may be the result of a nervous shock or some disease. Interpretation of seeing the mobile phone symbol in a dream by Ibn Sirin Symbol of a charger Mobile phone in a single woman’s dream. If a girl sees n

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream as good or bad?

preview.html: The meaning of seeing dogs in a dream. Through this encyclopedia article, you can see the interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream in detail. The symbol of dogs in a dream is one of the symbols that makes the dreamer curious to know its repercussions in reality. It is one of the most common animal symbols in the world of dreams, as the dog is considered one of the most beloved pets. . For a person who is acquired at home and cared for, the meaning of sight varies according to his circumstances, such as the color and type of the dog, whether it is domestic or a wild dog. Review the interpretation of the meaning of this dream by senior jurists. Interpretation of a dream about dogs. Jurists interpreted the interpretation of dreams. Seeing dogs, in general, is a sign of the dreamer’s love for people who do not deserve him. The previous vision also expresses ignorance, arrogance, greed, and an unjust ruler in his power. Among the undesirable signs mentioned by dream interpreters with the meaning This dream indicates the dreamer’s lack of commitment to obeying God and the frequent commission of sins and disobedience. If the dreamer sees many dogs in a dream, the meaning of that lies in the presence of someone who has enmity and hatred in reality, but cannot harm him. Interpretation of dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained That he saw dogs in a dream is an indication of the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life, whether they are strong or weak, and the vision also expresses his struggle with enemies. Seeing a dog in a dream also symbolizes the dreamer’s distance from God and the frequency of committing prohibited things. Seeing a female dog in a dream means that The dreamer has been deceived in reality, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees that he is eating dog meat in a dream, this is one of the good dreams that indicate overcoming enemies in reality. If you dream that a dog has bitten you in a dream, this means that you are facing a crisis in reality. If The dreamer dreams of hearing dogs barking, this indicates the presence of unfair people in his life. A dog attack in a dream. Seeing a dog attack in a dream reflects an attack on the dreamer who hates him in reality. Among the interpretations of a dream of a dog attack, it indicates the negative feelings that the dreamer is experiencing about something In fact, as an expression of the vision of a dog attack in a dream, as well as of the obstacles that prevent the dreamer from achieving what he wants in reality. Escaping from dogs in a dream. As for the meaning of the dream of escaping from dogs, it is one of the good dreams that indicate the stability of the dreamer’s life after getting rid of the crises that were occupying his life. The vision of escaping from dogs in a dream also expresses self-effort and caution against committing forbidden things. This vision reflects the extent of the dreamer’s fear of dogs in reality or of something that bothers him. One of the praiseworthy symbols of this vision is that it expresses regaining safety from dangers in reality. Fear of dogs in a dream is a crossing Seeing fear of dogs in a dream is about the extent to which the dreamer is afraid of something in reality. One of the interpretations of seeing fear of dogs in a dream is that it indicates the dreamer’s need for reassurance. This vision also symbolizes his fear of dogs in reality. Interpretation of seeing dead dogs in a dream. The meaning of dreaming of dead dogs indicates On the success of the situation

title: The 7 most popular interpretations of seeing fingers in a dream: A guide to nourishment and kindness

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing fingers on nails during the five daily prayers? Evidence of humiliating and prophetic Sunnahs. Interpretation of seeing injured fingers in a dream? Unpleasant visions. What is the interpretation of seeing a cut ring? Details of the fortuneteller’s livelihood with a born child. Interpretation of seeing injured fingers in a girl’s dream? Evidence of exposure to certain problems. Interpretation of seeing short fingers? Evidence of negligence in prayer and worship. Seeing fingers in a dream: Fingers in a dream refer to the five daily prayers, and nails are evidence of humiliating actions and prophetic hadiths. Seeing fingers in a dream means armies, soldiers, and weapons. Then seeing An increase in the fingers is a sign of goodness and abundant food. Then seeing the amputation of the fingers is evidence of the loss of one of his children. Injured fingers in a dream are unpleasant visions. Then seeing the injured fingers is a sign of the betrayal of the closest friends. Then the wound on the fingers indicates the betrayal of the friend and relatives. Interpr Then, seeing a child’s little finger being cut off is evidence that the dreamer is breastfeeding a baby. Then seeing a man in a dream that he cannot move his fingers, this indicates a financial loss that he will suffer. Then seeing weak fingers in the dream is evidence of family disputes that will happen to this man. Seeing a dream Single Fingers: Seeing cut off fingers in a girl’s dream is evidence of some problems. Then seeing cut off fingers is evidence of the misfortunes that she will go through. After that, to see cut off fingers means that you are going through a test. Interpretation of a dream about fingers by Al-Nabulsi. If one sees in a dream that he is cutting off another person’s fingers, then this It indicates the loss that the dreamer will experience in his money and exposure to some troubles and problems. Then seeing pain in the fingers is a sign of the evil that will happen to him, and it is one of the unpleasant visions. The fingers of the left hand indicate children and grandchildren. Then seeing the fingers intertwined indicates that the fortuneteller is the one who collects Between prayer. Seeing cracked fingers in a dream is evidence of bad statements that the dreamer is exposed to from relatives. Then seeing blood or milk coming out of his thumb indicates adultery with the sister of one of his mahrams. Whoever dreams of cutting off his finger is evidence of a person who will cause him financial losses. Then seeing An extra finger on the hand is evidence of increased prayer. Then seeing fingers shortened is evidence of negligence in prayer and worship. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish. Shrimps in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish. Suicide in a dream. Vomiting in a dream. Feces in a dream. Appointment in a dream. Snake in a dream. Someone you love several times. Interpretation of seeing dead people. Ants in a dream. Jeans in a dream.
